page.title: 02Bentfield Bury Farm
page.content: inspectors come round to inspect the fields. Their winter wheat is exported as food. On the farm they have two boar. Fifty sows run onto cutters, this means that they are 180 pounds in weight. 500 pigs on average house, that means that they have enough room for 500 pigs. 30 acres is for the sheep to graze on. They have 350 acres of winter wheat, 50 acres of potatoes, 20 acres of sugarbeet, 62 acres of peas, 34 acres of winter barley, 82 acres of spring barley and 100 acres of grass seed. On the farm they plan four years ahead. The planning is very complicated. If they get grass seed a field within each each other,the bees will cross_pollinate the grass seed and they will not get the true variety.
